staxel.village.character.dialogue.ErisLi: (안함)I really do love hunting bugs, but there's definitely more out there I can do!
(안함)I don't think I've reached my full potential yet!
(안함)Those wagons the Murmurs have are pretty cool, right?
(안함)I've always wanted to have one of my own!
(안함)Wouldn't have been much use for bug hunting though...
